get.summary: EscrowAddress returns the escrow address for a particular port and channel id.
ClassHash queries a class id hash information.

parameters.name: pagination.key
parameters.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

parameters.name: pagination.offset
parameters.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.

parameters.name: pagination.limit
parameters.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

parameters.name: pagination.count_total
parameters.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs.
count_total is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key
is set.

parameters.name: pagination.reverse
parameters.description:
reverse is set to true if results are to be returned in the descending order.

Since: cosmos-sdk 0.43

get.summary: ClassTrace queries a denomination trace information.

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: hash (in hex format) of the class id trace information.

get.summary: Params queries all parameters of the ibc-transfer module.

key.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

offset.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.

limit.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

count_total.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs.
count_total is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key
is set.

reverse.description:
reverse is set to true if results are to be returned in the descending order.

Since: cosmos-sdk 0.43

cosmos.base.query.v1beta1.PageRequest.title:
PageRequest is to be embedded in gRPC request messages for efficient
pagination. Ex:

next_key.description:
next_key is the key to be passed to PageRequest.key to
query the next page most efficiently. It will be empty if
there are no more results.

total.title:
total is total number of results available if PageRequest.count_total
was set, its value is undefined otherwise

path.description:
path defines the chain of port/channel identifiers used for tracing the
source of the non fungible token.

base_class_id.description: base class id of the relayed non fungible token.

ibc.applications.nft_transfer.v1.ClassTr.description:
ClassTrace contains the base class id for ICS721 non fungible tokens and the
source tracing information path.

send_enabled.description: send_enabled enables or disables all cross-chain token transfers from this chain.

receive_enabled.description: receive_enabled enables or disables all cross-chain token transfers to this chain.

ibc.applications.nft_transfer.v1.Params.description: Params defines the set of IBC nft transfer parameters.

hash.description: hash (in hex format) of the class id trace information.

ibc.applications.nft_transfer.v1.QueryCl.description:
QueryClassHashResponse is the response type for the Query/ClassHash RPC
method.

class_trace.description: class_trace returns the requested class id trace information.

ibc.applications.nft_transfer.v1.QueryCl.description:
QueryClassTraceResponse is the response type for the Query/ClassTrace RPC
method.

class_traces.description: class_traces returns all class id traces information.

pagination.description: pagination defines the pagination in the response.

ibc.applications.nft_transfer.v1.QueryCl.description:
QueryClassTracesResponse is the response type for the Query/ClassTraces RPC
method.

ibc.applications.nft_transfer.v1.QueryEs.description: QueryEscrowAddressResponse is the response type of the EscrowAddress RPC method.

params.description: params defines the parameters of the module.

ibc.applications.nft_transfer.v1.QueryPa.description: QueryParamsResponse is the response type for the Query/Params RPC method.
